evidence.claim: Quorum utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing needs.
The company adheres to FHIR standards for healthcare data interactions.
Quorum offers integration with HL7 protocols for health information exchange.
They use Amazon S3 for data storage and management in cloud solutions.
Google Cloud Platform is used for data analytics and processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or relevant healthcare data exchange use cases found.
